docs.title: MAFIA - Middleware AI Firewall Application
docs.text: MAFIA adalah middleware Python yang berfungsi untuk mendeteksi dan mencegah serangan brute force serta memblokir payload berbahaya (XSS, SQL Injection, dan sejenisnya). Middleware ini cocok diintegrasikan pada aplikasi berbasis FastAPI atau Starlette.

docs.title: 🔧 Instalasi
docs.text: pip install git+https://github.com/akarkode/mafia.git

docs.title: 🚀 Cara Menggunakan
docs.text:
Tambahkan middleware pada aplikasi FastAPI kamu: 

from mafia.middleware import BruteForceMiddleware
from fastapi import FastAPI

app = FastAPI()
app.add_middleware(BruteForceMiddleware, redis_url="redis://localhost:6379")

Middleware akan secara otomatis: - Mendeteksi dan memblokir permintaan mencurigakan dari IP yang sama. - Menjalankan klasifikasi AI untuk percobaan brute-force. - Memblokir request yang mengandung payload berbahaya.

docs.title: 1. Deteksi Brute Force
docs.text: Model AI BruteForceDetector menganalisis pola login mencurigakan berdasarkan fitur seperti frekuensi dan interval permintaan.

docs.title: 2. Filter Payload Berbahaya
docs.text: SecurityFilter menyaring: - Serangan XSS: <script>, onerror=, javascript: - SQL Injection: ' OR 1=1, UNION SELECT, --, dll

docs.title: 3. Rate Limiting
docs.text: RedisClient digunakan untuk membatasi jumlah permintaan berdasarkan alamat IP.

docs.title: 🧠 Struktur Internal
docs.text:
[Client] → [BruteForceMiddleware]
   ├─ [RedisClient] - rate limiting
   ├─ [BruteForceDetector] - klasifikasi brute force
   └─ [SecurityFilter] - blokir XSS/SQLi

docs.title: MAFIA - Middleware AI Firewall Application
docs.text: MAFIA is a Python middleware designed to detect and prevent brute force attacks and block malicious payloads (such as XSS, SQL Injection, etc.). This middleware can be easily integrated into FastAPI or Starlette-based applications.

docs.title: 🔧 Instalation
docs.text: pip install git+https://github.com/akarkode/mafia.git

docs.title: 🚀 Usage
docs.text:
Add the middleware to your FastAPI application: 

from mafia.middleware import BruteForceMiddleware
from fastapi import FastAPI

app = FastAPI()
app.add_middleware(BruteForceMiddleware, redis_url="redis://localhost:6379")

This middleware will automatically: - Detect and block suspicious requests from the same IP. - Classify login attempts using an AI-based model. - Block any requests containing potentially malicious payloads.

docs.title: 1. Brute Force Detection
docs.text: The BruteForceDetector AI model analyzes login attempt patterns based on frequency and interval features.

docs.title: 2. Malicious Payload Filtering
docs.text: The SecurityFilter scans and blocks: - XSS attacks: <script>, onerror=, javascript: - SQL Injection: ' OR 1=1, UNION SELECT, --, etc.

docs.title: 3. Rate Limiting
docs.text: The RedisClient module limits request frequency based on the user's IP address.

docs.title: 🧠 Internal Architecture
docs.text:
[Client] → [BruteForceMiddleware]
   ├─ [RedisClient] - rate limiting
   ├─ [BruteForceDetector] - brute force classification
   └─ [SecurityFilter] - XSS/SQLi filtering
